root._comment: gulpfile will add in locales by default, using english as fallback.  If not relying on gulpfile, a locale needs to be explicitely specified (i.e. 'pt : ') for it to be a valid locale and inherit from the root keys
root._comment2: this can be finicky.  if gulpfile has errors, then check json format, such as extraneous commas, etc...  If live reloading, may also need to shut down, clean, rebuild, and run
like: one {You and someone else liked this}
one {Usted y otra persona han gustado este}
other {Usted y # otras han gustado este}
one {You and someone else liked this}
other {You and # german folk liked this}
